briefdescription.para: This function handles Hard Fault exception.
This function handles Memory Manage exception.
This function handles Bus Fault exception.
This function handles Usage Fault exception.
This function handles Debug Monitor exception.
This function handles PPP interrupt request.
This function handles SPI6 global interrupt.
This function handles SPI2 global interrupt.
HAL IT Module, definition of IRQ handlers for hardware units, based on project examples Templates\Src\stm32f7xx_it.c.

simplesect.para: 06-May-2016 Main Interrupt Service Routines. This file provides template for all exceptions handler and peripherals interrupt service routine.
